name: Nano Small Stone
details:
PhaserGet the sound that made the Classic 1970 Small Stone famous. Generates thick sweeping phase shifting with liquid transparency. Feedback color control adds a tingling swirl. Blues players dig the Stone's rapid rotating speaker effect. Country players add tasty seasoning to their chicken pickin'. Metal-heads dig its jet plane swoosh.
http://www.ehx.com/products/small-stone
